channel.title: Variables on A Sysadmin, An SRE, and a DevOps Walk Into a Bar
channel.description: Recent content in Variables on A Sysadmin, An SRE, and a DevOps Walk Into a Bar

item.title: Back to Basics - Variable Names
item.description: $x and $z and $foo just aren’t going to cut it in your production scripts.  Andy Schneider tweeted during the Scripting Games that there was no penalty for providing a descriptive variable name.  He was right and not quite right enough.  Twitter does not provide you the opportunity to share more than a sound bite in one tweet, so he really could not have commented much further there, but he did in a post that expanded on what judges were looking for in style for the Scripting Games.
